Name: Happy Mining
About the game: Happy Mining Travel to the beautiful and colorful world of Sunny Island for relaxation and distraction found from everyday life. The motivating game mechanics will draw you into the cheerful universe of Happy Mining. Game world: The bright and friendly world of Sunny Island is a small open world that can be freely explored. In the course of the game you can find closed paths such as e.g. B. Unlock bridges and access to to get new materials. The goal of the game is the relaxed exploitation of resources in order to then use the yield to Enlarge and automate workplaces. The world also invites you to explore. Character / Skill system: At the beginning of your journey, create a character that you can customize. Gender, appearance and outfit are customizable from a wide range. Your character can also improve their skills by purchasing new skills such as the Increase in mining speed, mining efficiency, etc. Game mechanics: As a collector, you start mining different stones. The collected resources you can then sell at the merchant to get new tools, skills or area unlocks acquire. Expand your workplace by building a mine, forge, smelter and more Hire workers (NPC) to collect even more resources. Story / Secrets: The world of Happy Mining also contains a subtle backstory, but not in the foreground. As you explore the world, in addition to degradable materials, you will also get open ones to discover mysteries.
